title: Eggs Benedict
ingredients: ['For the hollandaise sauce', '3 egg yolks', '1 tablespoon cold water', '150g butter, cut into cubes and softened', '1 to 2 teaspoons lemon juice, to taste', '1 pinch salt', 'For the poached eggs', '4 eggs', '1 tablespoon vinegar', 'For serving', '2 toasting muffins or 4 slices ciabatta bread, toasted', '4 slices cooked ham or Parma ham', 'finely chopped chives, to garnish']
